SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM NUM,N. * FROM (SELECT * FROM COMMUMEMBERS WHERE MID=#{param1} ORDER BY CNUM DESC) N) WHERE NUM BETWEEN #{param2} AND #{param3}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM NUM, O_CODE,O_DATE,P_NAME,P_COLOR,P_SIZE,O_COUNT,O_PRICE FROM ORDERINFO WHERE MID=#{param3} AND NOT O_CODE IN(SELECT R.O_CODE FROM MEMBERS M , REVIEW R WHERE R.MID=M.MID) ORDER BY O_CODE ASC) WHERE NUM BETWEEN #{param1} AND #{param2}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT ROWNUM NUM, O_CODE FROM ORDERINFO WHERE MID=#{param1} AND NOT O_CODE IN(SELECT R.O_CODE FROM MEMBERS M , REVIEW R WHERE R.MID=M.MID) ORDER BY O_CODE ASC)
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEW WHERE MID=#{param1}
